code: var NumbersFormat={RateFormatter:function RateFormatter(str,fix){return(+str/Math.pow(10,fix)).toFixed(1).toString()+"%";},ProdNumberFormatter:function ProdNumberFormatter(str,fix){var offuscatedNum=str;if(str.length>fix){offuscatedNum="******"+str.slice(str.length-fix,str.length);}return offuscatedNum;},CleanProductNum:function CleanProductNum(str){return(+str.replaceAll("-","")).toString();},CleanCurrencyFormat:function CleanCurrencyFormat(str){return str.replace(/[^0-9]/g,'');}};export default NumbersFormat;
